remarks: Separate out a term in a finite sum.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fsumsplit1.kph $e |- F/ k ph $.
fsumsplit1.kd $e |- F/_ k D $.
fsumsplit1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumsplit1.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumsplit1.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. A ) $.
fsumsplit1.bd $e |- ( k = C -> B = D ) $.
fsumsplit1 $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B = ( D + sum_ k e. ( A \ { C } ) B ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d C k $.
